[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Corporate Events” text_orientation=”center” button_one_text=”Contact Us” button_one_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwOCJ9fQ==@” button_two_text=”Get A Quote” background_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.61)” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_one_url” _module_preset=”default” content_font_size=”20px” background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://partydecorhire.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/Party-Decor-Hire-corporate-events.png” parallax=”on” background_blend=”overlay” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We excel at crafting compelling messages and creating sensational atmospheres for corporate events, ensuring your company brand shines with quality and professionalism. Whether it’s a gala dinner, year-end function, golf day, special promotion, or conference, we’ll bring your vision to life with stunning precision. With our expertise in floral styling and captivating centerpieces, we guarantee to turn heads and leave a lasting impression on your guests.

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”10px||20px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”EVENT SET-UP” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||divi||400″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let us ease your event planning stress by handling all the logistics. From delivering your requirements to the venue to setting up the decor and placing beautiful centerpieces, we ensure every detail is taken care of seamlessly. Relax and enjoy your event knowing that everything has been expertly arranged by our team.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”TABLE DÉCOR/Center piece” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” header_font=”|||on|||||” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Discover our extensive range of table decor options, allowing us to curate flawless table displays featuring captivating centrepieces customized to your preferences and style. Whether your taste leans towards traditional, contemporary, or themed designs, we are adept at transforming your vision into reality.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”FLORAL DISPLAYS” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]Whether you need flowers for reception tables, podiums, or buffet displays, we’ll tailor arrangements to your specifications while staying within your budget. Let us take care of every floral detail, ensuring your event is adorned with beauty and elegance without exceeding your financial limits.[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”DRAPING AND LIGHTING” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||divi||400″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]Count on our draping expertise to conceal any unsightly spaces, transforming them into elegant surroundings. Paired with our skillfully crafted lighting, we’ll create a soft and inviting atmosphere that sets the perfect mood for your event. Let us enhance your venue with our draping and lighting solutions, ensuring every corner exudes charm and allure.[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Photo Booth” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” header_font=”|||on|||||” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Elevate your corporate event with our retro photo booth experience. Our retro and 360 booths capture every moment, from professional headshots to group shots, providing lasting memories for you and your colleagues. With customizable options, instant printing, and digital sharing, the excitement of your event is shared far and wide. Let our professional team take care of every detail, ensuring a seamless and engaging experience. Contact us today to book your date and elevate your corporate gathering with our photo booth

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
